page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Nicola, I am 10 years old. I live in a village called Farnham Common. On Saturdays I get up at about 8,00 and have a cooked breakfast with my brother, mummy and Jane. My sister has breakfast earlier because she goes riding at 8.15. Then I do my prep and at ll.00 I have a french lesson with my godmother. Then I ride my bike with Jane to the library to get some books, and do some shopping for mummy. By that time it is lunch and sometimes I have a friend over. In the afternoon we go out somewhere or play in the garden, then I feed our rabbit and Jane feeds the dogs. Christopher has a bath and a boiled egg for supper and then he goes to bed. After that Jane cooks the supper and we eat it in the front room on trays watching the television. I think Saturday is my favourite day.
